note:
Can't you see? This war is just another step on the way to a dystopia of climate breakdown with worsening heatwaves, floods, droughts, crazy food and fuel prices and famines, forced migrations and fascist dictators and ultimately war lords.
Our news cycles have been stuffed with Brexit, Covid, Vaccinations, now a Ukraine/Russia war with fears of Nuclear power stations and threats of WW3. While the bigger story is kept off the front pages.
Without denying the true horror of countries affected.
